attributes.action: follow the example of the Scottish Parliament, and abolish road tolls in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of The Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill, which received royal assent on 24 January 2008, and which will remove the last road tolls in Scotland, will the Prime Minister make a commitment to the people of England to similarly scrap road tolls in this country?
